mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_food (id_card, breakfast, lunch, dinner, food_date) VALUES (#{idCard}, #{breakfast}, #{lunch}, #{dinner}, #{foodDate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE breakfast = VALUES(breakfast), lunch = VALUES(lunch), dinner = VALUES(dinner)
mapper.select: SELECT id_card as idCard, breakfast, lunch, dinner, food_date as foodDate FROM user_food WHERE id_card = #{idCard} AND food_date = #{foodDate}
